#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<set>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int mycoprime(int a,int b)
{
    int temp,l;
    l = b%a;
    if(l==0)
        return 0;
    else if(l==1)
        return 1;
    else
        return (mycoprime(l,a));
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,test,maxx,ss,bi,val,as,c,dd,cou,x,aa,bb,k,n,m,tt,rr,sumc,vv,las,ld,y,h;
    int ans;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        cou=0;
        ans=0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=1;i<=n-1;i++)
        {
            k = mycoprime(i,n);
            if(k)
            {
                cou++;
            }

        }
        printf("%d\n",cou+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
